main.name: Sasha Demyanik
main.occupation: Software Engineer, mobile app developer, web developer
main.description: I develop C++ and Qt applications by day and create mobile apps/web solutions by night!
main.bio: Skilled Software Engineer with 4 years of professional and hands-on experience in all levels of software development including designing, implementing, testing, releasing and maintaining products. Constantly building new skills, developing existing talents, and striving for success; dedicated to improving stakeholder results.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Courses: Mobile App Development, Data Structures, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Intro to Database Systems.

work.title: Software Engineer II
work.description: Released label editing program to customers across multiple devices using C++ and Qt. Decreased developer testing time by 40% through creation of an automated testing framework for a label editing application. Delivered a Windows printer driver alongside new company product. Identified and implemented new features to existing software suite to improve usability and functionality based on customer feedback.

work.title: IT Intern
work.description: Migrated company SharePoint pages for multiple departments from SharePoint 2007 to SharePoint 2010. Audited internal permissions system in Lotus to improve efficiency of user permission approval.

projects.title: Then Sings My Soul
projects.description: A simple Android app that lists and displays Christian worship songs in English, Ukrainian and Russian along with the corresponding guitar chords. Uses a SQLite database to store the songs.

projects.title: Paul's Motor Inc Website
projects.description: This is a basic HTML/CSS website for a small, local automotive business. This project has 4 pages including an index, about, services and contact page.

projects.title: Scenes From A Hat Android App
projects.description: A simple Android application I created to better understand the process of publishing an Android app. The app creates an array of scenes for the user and is randomly displayed each time the hat is tapped.

projects.title: Pick Me Up Sports App
projects.description: Pick Me Up is an iOS mobile application designed to find non-professional sporting events within a user's area and allows users to join or create sport events. Users may also search for a specific event or view websites of popular professional sites through the app.
